full_summary:
## EZ899-231093 Tender Announcement

### Ethnic Language Support

This tender is available in both English and French. The contract documents may be obtained in English or French.

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: December 9, 2022, 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 6, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2023

### Notice Type and Approach

* Notice Type: Invitation to Qualify
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Work Description

The work under this contract involves the construction of a new parking lot and site improvements for the RCMP Bowen Island Detachment located at 1017 Miller Road, Bowen Island, British Columbia. The scope of work includes:

* Milling and overlay
* Stomp and grubbing
* Removal of existing pavers
* New sidewalk construction
* Existing median removal and grading
* Drainage work at the rear parking lot
* Installation of concrete valley gutter
* Line and symbol painting
* New light installation

### Key Contracting Details

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Regions of Opportunity: None

### Points of Contact

* Summer Wong, PSPC
* Phone: None
* Email: [summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information and Resources

* Tender Notice URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14730028?extsite=MTQ3MzAwMjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* All documents are available on the Buy and Sell website. Once you have a profile, you can access and download the documents for this tender.

### Future Directions

As of December 9, 2022, the tender has closed and is now in the evaluation process. Bidders who submitted a proposal will be notified once the evaluation process is complete. All information related to this tender will be available on the Buy and Sell website. No updates will be made to this page. Bidders who have questions or concerns should contact Summer Wong directly via email or phone.  [summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)  No changes will be made without
